How do I register at the institute?: How do I register at the institute?
You can easily register via Nafath accou: You can easily register via Nafath account or create an internal account. After registration, you can choose the academic path or short courses that suit you.
We provide several payment methods inclu: We provide several payment methods including: credit cards, Mada, bank transfer, and payment upon registration. We also offer installment options for long paths.
Yes, all our certificates are accredited: Yes, all our certificates are accredited by the Technical and Vocational Training Corporation and recognized in the Saudi labor market.
The term system is a system of dividing: The term system is a system of dividing the training path into specific time periods (quarters), each lasting a certain period, which helps organize the training process and periodically evaluate the trainee's progress.
Can I switch from one path to another?: Can I switch from one path to another?
Yes, you can switch between paths accord: Yes, you can switch between paths according to specific academic conditions and after reviewing the completed training hours and coordinating with the academic administration.
How do I get technical support?: How do I get technical support?
The technical support team is available: The technical support team is available around the clock to answer your inquiries and solve any technical problems you may encounter. You can contact us via phone, email, or ticket system.
Yes, we provide remote training options: Yes, we provide remote training options for most of our courses and training paths, with all educational materials and resources available electronically.
What is the duration of a short course?: What is the duration of a short course?
Short courses range from two weeks to 8: Short courses range from two weeks to 8 weeks depending on the nature and content of the course.
